about_the_game:
This is what happens when you let people make video games.

Included within are horrible non-lifelike drawings done in Photoshop. All party members get a new outfit, a piece of this illustrative action.

To switch outfits:


- Go to the specified characters room on your ship
- Select the Switch Outfits options
- Click on Pocket Universe
- Click on Alt-Skins
detailed_description:
This is what happens when you let people make video games.

Included within are horrible non-lifelike drawings done in Photoshop. All party members get a new outfit, a piece of this illustrative action.

To switch outfits:


- Go to the specified characters room on your ship
- Select the Switch Outfits options
- Click on Pocket Universe
- Click on Alt-Skins
